attributes.action: Stop paying road tax untill the roads start getting fixed
attributes.background: We want the pot holes fixing

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what you'd like Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/210838

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
